resources.string: Oxford Brookes radio is run solely by students for students, our main aim is to share entertainment and information amongst students and to provide everyone at Oxford Brookes University with a platform from which they can make their voice heard.
If you\'ve got an idea you\'d like to share for a show send an e-mail to Hannah Sareen - 11022129@brookes.ac.uk to book a 30 minute slot on our audition show Amateur Hour.
Brookes Radio is not online, check the schedule for more details
You are not connected to the Internet
